basics.name: Vashu Raghav
basics.label: Software Engineer | IIT(ISM) Dhanbad
basics.summary: An AI/ML Enthusiast who is currently working as a Software Developer at Global Logic Pvt. Ltd. Bangalore

education.institution: Indian Institute of Technology (ISM) Dhanbad, India

work.summary: Working as a Java Developer for a marketing automation tool from Marketo - an Adobe Company.
highlights: Worked on various Java based framework like Spring Boot, Hibernate, TestNg etc.
Developed a Voice-Based Chat Assistant for the Marketo - An Adobe Company using RASA Conversation framework (NLP)  in python.

work.summary: Worked as a Full Stack Developer and outsource for a US based firm called Nurture Co
highlights: Gained insight of various frontend & backend libraries/framework of JavaScript like Node.JS, Express, ReactJS

work.summary: Worked as a Poker Bot Developer for the mobile gaming application named Poker Square
highlights: Developed a Poker-Bot Algorithm using Monte Carlo Simulation.
Implemented the algorithm using Elixir Programming in the gaming application.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: First Place

awards.title: Fest Logo Designer

awards.title: Second Place
